attributes.action: Create parity of university funding for british people living in England, and Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As British taxpayers we pay the same as any taxpayer in England or Scotland, however in return our children incur huge debt for further education, whilst british people resident in scotland receive far better support from our taxes.

As this is paid from the British (not Scottish) Tax fund we demand that our children receive equal benefit from our taxes.

We would hope that a Scottish Prime Minister of Britain would be suitably embarassed by this clear favouritism that he will urgently address the situation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
